name: RetroBot Oscillotron
description: The RetroBot Oscillotron is a vintage-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot, designed to captivate with its retro charm. With its rossoCorsa colored box and classic button controls, this robot takes you back to the golden era of gaming. Equipped with a laser screen, it combines the nostalgia of old-school gaming with advanced technology. As a proud member of the WebtrES club, the Oscillotron is ready to participate in thrilling adventures in the digital realm.
